masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We're drowning in packages! The sorting machine broke down and we've got 10,000 parcels that need to go out TODAY or they won't make Christmas. My staff has been here 16 hours. If anyone has super-speed or can lift heavy things quickly... please?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Help sort packages at super-speed if possible
  • Keep postal workers' spirits upâ€”they're exhausted
  • Make sure priority packages get out first
